rules_text: Whenever an Elemental creature you control enters, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if three or more lands you control have entered this turn, transform this.
rules_text2: When this enchantment transforms into Omnath Reborn, create two ☆/☆ green Elemental creature tokens with “This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.”
notes:
Needs_Art

Whenever an Elemental creature you control enters, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if three or more lands you control have entered this turn, transform this.
Ommath Reborn
Legendary Creature - Elemental
(Green Blue Red Color indicator.)
When this enchantment transforms into Omnath Reborn, create two ☆/☆ Elemental creature tokens with “This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.”
7/7

Rank 3 - We should keep an eye on how easy this is to flip. Most of the Elementals in this cube are made from lands, so they won't be entering
